# View email templates

Learn how to view email templates in the Zuora UI.

1.  Navigate to C in the left navigation menu.
2.  Click the Email Templates tab.

    You can find all email templates in the Email Templates sub-tab within the Email Templates section.

    ![Email Templates tab](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/c563d1bd-b801-4003-b91c-0837e60202fb?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..buGwS-iJQyzzGA9tW_hr3vi9mTIUx2iQD7VfDvQAi-k)
